main.name: Mercedes Y Thompson
main.bio: 'Hi! I have a wide array of skills and interests, having an education in both Computer Science and Animation. If what you have is new to me I tend to be a quick study. I love playing the violin and working on personal projects, or just playing Dungeons and Dragons with my friends. Feel free to get in touch, I'm happy to hear from you!'
main.contactmessage: I'm happy to hear from you and ,answer any questions.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: I experienced a curriculum focused on common business and development practices, as well as adaptability in different development environments, including group agile settings and client interationc.

I had a well rounded animaation experience, dabbling in everything from 2D, 3D, and pre-production culminating in class-directed short films. The program also included a focus on traditional art, the painting above is one of my pieces.

work.title: Software Development Intern
work.description: Collaborated with Senior developer over the course of a short summer internship.

work.title: Freelance
work.description: Work typically were made for websites, most notably a mental health blog site in which my illustrations were companions to articles.

projects.title: Secure chat/ Ticket web app (in progress)
projects.category: Main contribution in frontend and modularity, as well as dataflow.

projects.title: Multi-interface cooperative game (in-Progress
projects.category: So far I was part of creating the system design and led the first iteration of the design guide
